ethanol kudu kasino lankawata gena aawe mahinda yugaye nowe .wadima kudu thoga ath adanguwata ganune mahinda yugaya thulaya.esema maha kudu jawaramkara wele sudawa athadanguwata ganimata awashya katayuthu kaleda gotabhaya mahathage mulikathwayeni .esema boho kudu jawaramkaruwan raten pana giyeda meheyumwalata biyeni ethanol yanu adhisandra madhyasara wana athara eya lowa kisindu rataka nithiwirodhi mathdrawyayak nowe.lankawe kasino balapathra 5k nikuth kara athi athara ema balapathragabhin wisin kolambaa wena wenama sthana wala kasino samaja shala pawathwagena yayi.

thawada marga sanwardhana adhikariya wisin arafa bhumiyehi simawa itha pahadiliwa salakunu kara hamaraya.ebawin kandu mudunata goda wimata uthsaha darimen walaki sitiya yuthuya.epamanak nowa owun karana mema krayawen arafa bhumiyehi thadabadayak athiwi aarawul ha kalahayan athiwimata puluwani.haj karthawyayehi niyali sitina siyalu muslim bathimathun sathu wagakimak nam mewani hirihara kari thathwayen midi allah namadimayi.

horana - ingiriya haraha palmadulla dakwa diwena kilomitar 71.8ka digin yuth ruwanpura adhiwegi margaya idikirima pilibanda katayuthu me wanawita sakaswemin pawathi.kahathuduwa piwisuma osse moragahahena, handapangoda, ingiriya, kirialla osse rathnapura sita palmadulla dakwa diwena me margaye ingiriya nagaraye sita kilomitar 3.5k durin ingiriya piwisum doratuwa sthapithawimata niyamitha athara bope, mipe, mathugama, bulathsinhala aadi pradeshawalin paminena wahanawalata ema piwisuma osse nawa adhiwegi margayata athuluwiya haka.horana piwisum doratuwa horana nagaraye sita kilomitar 5ka durin mimana pradeshayata yabadawa pihituwana athara moragahahena, pokunuwita, horana pradeshawalin paminena ayata horana piwisuma osse adhiwegi margayata athulu wiya haka.kirialla nagarayata nudurin piwisum doratuwakda, kuruwita nagarayata kilomitar 5k durin thawath piwisum doratuwak da pihitawanu labanu athara rathnapura piwisum margaya arambaenne thiruwanakatiyeni.me margaya idikirimen pasu payaka pamana kalayakin kahathuduwe sita rathnapura haraha palmadullata langawimata hakiwanu athayi apeksha kere.

aahara pana, bhojanagara sewaya hotal gruha palanaya, sama kalamanakaranaya, amuththan piliganima saha mahajana sambandhikaranaya, batahira aaharapana sakasima hewath jathyanthara supa shasthraya, aparadiga aasiyanu aahara saha china aahara sadima, pestri saha bekari nishpadana sakasima, kichan aarts, kek ayisin athulu patamala rasak mehidi hadarime awakasha himi we.

mita amatharawa shri lanka waidya sabhawa deshapalana athapewim walin thora swadhina aayathanayak lesa pawathwa ganimata awashya parisaraya sakaskara dimatath nawa saukhya amathiwaraya samanga ekwa sudusu kriyamarga ganimatath agramathyawaraya aashirwadaya palakala bawada waidya haritha aluthge mahatha kiya. ← ejapayata parlimenthuwe bahutharaya nathiweyi, janapathita erehiwa gena doshabhiyogayakata sahaya denna mano ganeshan kiyayi maha mathiwaranaya janawari 10ta pera?
